title: Ping has gone from 42-64 in the past day.
body: I've tried all connectivity troubleshoots and can confirm absolutely nothing has changed on my end in the past day to warrant any increase in my ping. All my other games have the same ping also. What is the deal? Not only has the ping increased, but I also get some random packet loss and quick lag spikes. These are things I've never experienced before. Would just like to be informed on what is happening and when I can expect my old ping back.

replies.body: If other servers with your internet are fine except with your connection to our servers, then your ISP might be routing a long distance to reach our servers.  If you're still experiencing this, please run a [traceroute ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2) to get an overview of your routing, and submit it to our tech team via a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) who can look into this more.

The servers were upgraded yesterday, which can be a possible cause in the increase but you stated this has been happening for the past few days so that probably isn't the case for you.

Firstly; [Double check this article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if you missed anything. If you haven't proceed to my following step;

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/su16_keyart_1920x1080_0.jpg?itok=6nj8mHjj

If you continue to experience an increased ping;


Drop a line with Riot’s [Technical Support Centre](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=34190)


* The primary category has already been chosen. 


* For the secondary category, select **I’m lagging more than normal**
